thread.title: Outdoors calendar for Oct. 11
thread.title_full: Outdoors calendar for Oct. 11 - Sports - The Buffalo News

author: buffalonews
title: Outdoors calendar for Oct. 11
text:
Meetings
• Cattaraugus County Chapter of SCOPE, Franklinville Conservation Club, 3040 Bakerstand Road, 6:30 p.m., Monday. Call 373-3322 or 968-2720.
• Orleans County Chapter of SCOPE, VFW Post No. 4635, 38 N. Platt St., Albion, 7 p.m., Monday. Call (585) 589-6918.
• Erie County Conservation Society, 13319 Miller Ave., Chaffee, 7 p.m., Monday. Call (585) 457-3883.
• Genesee County Chapter of SCOPE, Calvary Baptist Church, Batavia, 7 p.m., Tuesday. Call (585) 356-4992.
• Wyoming/Genesee County Chapter of Pheasants Forever, Louie’s Lounge, Attica, 7:30 p.m., Tuesday. Call (585) 591-0339.
• Dorie Miller Rifle & Pistol Club, Frank E. Merriweather Jr. Library, 1324 Jefferson Ave., 5:30 p.m., Wednesday. Call 771-0138 or visit maxi7.com .
• Allied Sportsmen Club of WNY, 12846 Clinton St., Alden, 7 p.m., Wednesday. Call 937-3615.
• Erie County Chapter of Bassmasters, Doc Sullivan’s Bar, 474 Abbott Road, 7:30 p.m., Wednesday. Email: mschmittjr@aol.com .
• Erie County Chapter of SCOPE, VFW Post No. 8113, “The Chicken Coop,” 299 Lydecker Rd., West Seneca, 7 p.m., Thursday. Call 825-4174 or 685-4387.
Shooting sports
• North Forest Rod & Gun Club Ladies Shoot ‘N Hoot, 6257 Old Niagara Road, Lockport, 2:30-9 p.m., Oct. 24. Registrations must be in by Oct. 20. Call 628-9023 or email: Cghummingbird7@gmail.com .
Certification classes
To view the Department of Environmental Conservation registration format for certification classes, go to dec.ny.gov/outdoor/7860 .
Pistol
• Jim Carr Class: “Utah, Florida Arizona Multi-State Pistol Permit Class,” Niagara Gun Range, 3355 Niagara Falls Blvd., North Tonawanda, 9 a.m., Saturday. To register, call 778-9431. For all Carr classes, visit carrpsc.com .
• Firearms Training of WNY Classes: “New York State Pistol Permit Class,” VFW Post No. 1419, Hamburg, 6-9 p.m., Thursday; and “Multi-State Pistol Permit Class,” Northtown Center, Williamsville, 5:45-9:45 p.m., Oct. 29. Call 903-2558 or visit info@ftwny.com .
• Security Weapons & Training Institute, 659 Ridge Road, Lackawanna, “NYS Pistol Permit Class,” 6 p.m., Tuesday. Call 822-1043 or go to swatstore.com .
Banquets/fundraisers
• SCOPE 50th Anniversary Annual Awards Banquet, Lucarelli’s Banquet Center, Lackawanna, 5:30 p.m., cocktails, dinner at 7 p.m., Saturday. Guest speaker, Rob Astorino; Sandra Lee Wirth Memorial Legislator of the Year Award will be presented to Peter Lopez. For reservation details, visit scopeny.org .
Shows/seminars
• Niagara Frontier Gun Show, Newstead Fire Hall, 5691 Cummings Road, Akron, 9 a.m.-4 p.m., Saturday and 9 a.m.-3 p.m. Oct. 18, 85 tables. For show features and exhibitor details, visit nfgshows.com .
Hiking/nature
• Buffalo Audubon Society/ Beaver Meadow Center, 1610 Welch Road, North Java. Events: “Junior Audubon Club – Owl Prowl (for ages 8-16),” 7-9:30 p.m., Saturday; and “Family Walk at Beaver Meadow,” 2 p.m., Oct. 18. Most events require registration. Call (585) 457-3228 (ext. 10) or go to buffaloaudubon.org .
• Tifft Nature Preserve, 1200 Fuhrmann Blvd., Events: “Mini Naturalists Camp (for ages 5-8),” 9 a.m.-4 p.m., Monday; “Junior Naturalists Camp (for ages 9-11),” 9 a.m.-4 p.m., Monday; and “Little Tykes Mini Nature Camp (for ages 3-5),” 9:30-11:30 a.m., Monday. Call 825-6397 (ext. 338) or visit TIFFT.org.
• Reinstein Woods Nature Preserve, 93 Honorine Dr., Depew, Programs: “Owl Prowl (for adults and children ages 8 and older),” 6:30 p.m., Friday; and “Autumn’s Peak Hike-Fall Foliage Guided Walk,” 10:30 a.m., Saturday. Call 683-5959.
• New York State Parks Niagara Region Interpretive Programs: “Pet Friendly Fall Foliage Walk,” Artpark State Park, 1- 3 p.m., Saturday, call 282-5154; “Grassland Ecology Hike,” Knox Farm State Park, 1-3 p.m., Saturday, call 549-1050; “Evening Photography Hike to the Falls,” Knox Farm State Park,5:30-7:30 p.m., Saturday, call 549-1050; and “Fall Foliage Hike,” Niagara Falls State Park, 2-4 p.m., Oct. 18, call 282-5154. Registrations required for each event.
• Foothills Trail Club Events: “Como Lake Park Saunter,” 10 a.m., Tuesday, call 651-9877: and “Niagara Falls Gorge,” 11 a.m., Saturday, call 254-4285. For all Foothills events, visit foothillstrailclub.org .
• Hamburg Natural History Society Events: Penn Dixie site open to the public, 9 a.m.-5 p.m., Monday for Columbus Day and Wednesday for National Fossil Day. For more details, call 626-4560 or visit penndixie.org .
• Buffalo Geological Society event: trip to 43rd Annual Gem & Mineral Show, sponsored by the Bristol Gem & Mineral Club, Beals Community Center, 240 Stafford Ave., Bristol, Conn., Saturday & Sunday. Call 438-3794.
• Letchworth State Park Interpretive Programs: “Finger Lakes Trail Hike – St. Helena Section,” 10 a.m., Saturday; and “Indoor Ed-Venture – Tree Leaves,” 2 p.m., Oct. 18. Call (585) 493-3625.
Send items 15 days in advance to Will Elliott, 9777 Bernd Road, Pavilion, N.Y., 14525 or email odrswill@gmail.com .
